summary:
A standalone version of mr.Dave 
Atlantean and Father sword from the Conan movie.
descriptionHtml:
Update_____20.02.2012
===========================
Atlantean Sword new retextures from RabidShark1  version 1.2
now in 3 colors of the hilt: Bronze, Gold and Silver
Install with mod mannager
============================================================
===========================Now it really looks very good.
============================================================



or download manualy and read the install instrucions 
inside download files.
================================================================
================================================================

Update_____14.02.2012
=============================================
everything is updated and i hope fixed.
please give me some coments how it works and if you like the changes.

===Files are Mod Manager Suported====
With the help of the RabidShark1 and Mr.Dave
Fixed the meshes with normals again so now i think all the textures will be really better,
and the main file meshes should work with all the textures.

=======Updates to 3.3
1.ConanSwords Bigger Swords  (2h and 1H swords little bigger)

2.ConanSwords Smaller Swords (2h and 1H swords little smaller about 90% of the bigger version)

3.Conan swords with Scabard Bigger edition (Need main file  ConanSwords Bigger Swords)

4.Conan swords with Scabard Smaller edition (Need main file  ConanSwords Smaller Swords)

Updates the texture
1.RabidShark1_Atlantean retextures__1.1 (real good with golden bronze hilt. 
=======================================================================================
Update_____13.02.2012

1.Updated with modmanager suport
2.Update with RabidShark1 retexture (good one with bronze hilt and dull blade.)
3.Updated main meshes so all textures will fit.

Update_____29.01.2012
===========================
Scabards 
update download for 1 handed swords 

You need one of the main files
=================================
1.Conan Swords__Smaller Version Of swords  ____or
2.Conan Swords__ Biger Version Of swords

bigger is for 2h and 1h swords scaled bigger
smaller is for 2h and 1h swords scaled down to  about 90% of the bigger version.

downlod 
1.Conan swords with Scabard Smaller edition.rar___or
2.Conan swords with Scabard Bigger edition.rar

installation instruction is in download readme file.
===================================================================================
=====================================================================================
Update. 06.01.2011
=======================
Made a litle order in the download area.

Now two main versions one biger and other smaler swords.

All retextures are in optional now.

Update 24.12.2011
=================================
HD retexture for the Atlantean sword made by me.
___(2048x2048) textures and also improved normal map and runes on the blade.
___Download and replace the files AtlanteanGreatSword.dds and AtlanteanGreatSword_n.dds
____in data/textures/ConanSwords

Rhevn made a retexture of the Father sword.
   [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4346]Link To original Mod[/url]
   Blade looks more like a sword and it is a little darker

___Download and replace the files FatherSword.dds and FatherSword_n.dds
____in data/textures/ConanSwords

Bouth files are in download section.


Update  23.12.2011
=======================================================
I have uploud a smaller version of the swords.

=======================================================================================
               Read this for Conan Swords 1.0   20.12.2011
=======================================================================================

What this mod does:
====================

Import 4 swords to the game.

Atlantean Great Sword________2 handed (For the two handers lovers like myself)  
Atlantean Sword______________1 handed
Father Great Sword___________2 Handed  (For the two handers lovers like myself)
Father Sword_________________1 Handed

Installation Instructions:

Download the file:

1.ConanSwords
=========================================================================================
1. go to **(your user name)**\\Documents and Settings\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

open the SkyrimPrefs.ini with the notepad
and put this line under the [Launcher] section

bEnableFileSelection=1

2.Unpack the mod to a known location like (Desktop).

3.Find the folder labeled \'Data\' within the mods files.

Copy data folder to your Skyrim main folder where the TESV.exe is

When prompted by Windows if you would like to overwrite files with the same name
in the data folder located there answer, \"Yes To All\".

4.Start up Skyrim , and place a checkmark next to ConanSwords.esp
in your Data files.

5.Visit a smith and forge a swords under the Steel section you will find the 
swords: 
Atlantean Great Sword____2 handed____items to forge of a 2 handed Steel greatsword___damage of a glass greatsword
Atlantean Sword__________1 handed____items to forge of a 1 handed Steel sword___damage of a glass sword
Father Great Sword_______2 Handed____items to forge of a 2 handed Steel greatsword___damage of a glass greatsword
Father Sword_____________1 Handed____items to forge of a 1 handed Steel sword____damage of a glass sword

sword can be forged by the smith in next locations
- Riverwood
- Whiterun
- Makarath
- Solitude
- Windhelm

Un-Installation Instructions:
=========================================================================

Remove the checkmark from ConanSwords.esp in the
data files at start of the Skyrim launcher

If you would also like to remove the files

delate the folder___ConanSwords___from the_____data\\meshes\\weapons
and the folder______ConanSwords____from the_____data\\textures\\weapons
and the file ConanSwords.esp from the data folder
=========================================================================================
=========================================================================================
On the author site........[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4010]Visit Authors Page[/url]......... you can download 
additional textures to change the swords colours.
 Only thing you have to do is to download the files and rename any additional files like
 
 damatl01.dds:.......to.....AtlanteanGreatSword.dds....and copy the file to....data/textures/weapons/ConanSwords
 damatl01_n.dds.......to.....AtlanteanGreatSword_n.dds....and copy the file to....data/textures/weapons/ConanSwords
 
Permision of author of these mod.
===================================
No permision needed.  I didnt do nothing special, except make this beattiful sword 
a standalone noreplacer version.
=========================================================================================
=========================================================================================
Credits: and Permision of the author of the swords:  Mr. Dave     http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4010
=========================================================================================
=========================================================================================
=========================================================================================
     QUOTE
================
    Other user\'s assets
    All the assets in this file belong to the author, 
	or are from free-to-use modder\'s resources
	======================================================
    Upload permission
    You can upload this file to other sites 
	but you must credit me as the creator of the file
	========================================================
    Conversion permission
    You can convert this file to work with other games 
	as long as you credit me as the creator of the file
	============================================================
    Modification permission
    You are allowed to modify my files and release bug fixes or improve 
	on the features so long as you credit me as the original creator
====================================================================
    Asset use permission
    You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me
	=========================================================================================
    Author notes
===============
    Permissions:
===============
    Modify it, retexture it, make it a two handed version, make it a non replacer, and upload it everywhere. 
	No need to ask permission to upload, even if it is for a completely different game. 
	Just make sure to include this readme, so the credits are correct.
    File credits
	=========================================================================================
    Credits:
    Bethesda - for giving us a platform to modify
    Robert E. Howard - for bringing us Conan, God rest his insane soul
    John Milius - for bring us Conan the Barbarian
    Mr. Dave - original mesh and textures (hand painting textures is for chumps!
	Gimme my procedurals any day!)
    Mr. T. - you know why
    And last but not least, Qarl - if it hadn\'t been for Qarl and his Gothic Attire mod,
	I would have uninstalled Morrowind and gone about modding other games a very long time ago.
	The Bob\'s Armory franchise exists because of this man.
	=========================================================================================
	credits for the scabard
***********************************************************************************************************************************
